Identification.LongTitle: Special Economic Measures (South Sudan) Permit Authorization Order

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Foreign Affairs, pursuant to subsection 4(4) of the Special Economic Measures Acta, authorizes the Minister of Foreign Affairs to issue to any person in Canada or any Canadian outside Canada a permit to carry out a specified activity or transaction, or any class of activity or transaction, that is restricted or prohibited under the Special Economic Measures (South Sudan) Regulations.
